seo: SQL注入,时间盲注,Sleep,漏洞检测,安全测试
summary: 该插件用于检测Web应用程序中的SQL时间盲注漏洞，通过构造特定的SQL查询来判断是否存在时间延迟响应，从而确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is designed to detect time-based blind SQL injection vulnerabilities in web applications by constructing specific SQL queries to determine if there are delayed responses, confirming the existence of vulnerabilities.
